title: George Packer: How four Americas changed during the lockdown year
description: Award-winning author and staff writer at the Atlantic, George Packer joins the ToddCast to talk about his new book, written during the Covid lockdown and the 2020 election.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Award-winning author and staff writer at the Atlantic, George Packer joins the ToddCast to talk about his new book, written during the Covid lockdown and the 2020 election.
itunes:title: George Packer: How four Americas changed during the lockdown year
itunes:author: NBC News
itunes:summary: George Packer, author of "Last Best Hope: America in Crisis and Renewal,"  talks to Chuck Todd about how the country has splintered.
